030package javax.measure.test;
031
032import javax.measure.Quantity;
033import javax.measure.Unit;
034import javax.measure.quantity.Area;
035import javax.measure.quantity.Length;
036import javax.measure.quantity.Speed;
037import javax.measure.quantity.Time;
038import javax.measure.quantity.Volume;
039import javax.measure.test.quantity.DistanceQuantity;
040import javax.measure.test.quantity.TestQuantities;
041import javax.measure.test.quantity.VolumeQuantity;
042
043import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
044
045import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
046import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNull;
047
048import static javax.measure.MetricPrefix.*;
049import static javax.measure.test.unit.AreaUnit.*;
050import static javax.measure.test.unit.DistanceUnit.*;
051import static javax.measure.test.unit.SpeedUnit.*;
052import static javax.measure.test.unit.TimeUnit.*;
053import static javax.measure.test.unit.VolumeUnit.*;
054
055public class MetricPrefixTest {
056    @Test
057    public void testAtto() {
058        assertEquals("a", ATTO.getSymbol());
059        assertEquals("ATTO", ATTO.getName());
060        Quantity<Time> t1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, ATTO(min));
061        assertEquals("min * 0.000000000000000060", t1.getUnit().toString());
062    }
063
064    @Test
065    public void testCenti() {
066        assertEquals("c", CENTI.getSymbol());
067        assertEquals("CENTI", CENTI.getName());
068        Quantity<Length> l1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, CENTI(m));
069        assertEquals("m * 0.01", l1.getUnit().toString());
070    }
071
072    @Test
073    public void testDeci() {
074        Quantity<Volume> m1 = new VolumeQuantity(1.0, litre);
075        assertEquals(1d, m1.getValue());
076        assertEquals("litre * 0.001", m1.getUnit().toString());
077
078        Quantity<Volume> m2 = m1.to(DECI(litre));
079        assertNull(m2); // TODO temporary workaround
080    }
081
082    @Test
083    public void testDeka() {
084        assertEquals("da", DEKA.getSymbol());
085        Quantity<Volume> v1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, DEKA(litre));
086        assertEquals("0.01", v1.getUnit().toString());
087    }
088
089    @Test
090    public void testExa() {
091        assertEquals("E", EXA.getSymbol());
092        Quantity<Length> l1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, EXA(m));
093        assertEquals("m * 1000000000000000000", l1.getUnit().toString());
094    }
095
096    @Test
097    public void testFemto() {
098        assertEquals("f", FEMTO.getSymbol());
099        Quantity<Time> t1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, FEMTO(s));
100        assertEquals("s * 0.0000000000000010", t1.getUnit().toString());
101    }
102
103    @Test
104    public void testGiga() {
105        assertEquals("G", GIGA.getSymbol());
106        Quantity<Area> a1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, GIGA(acre));
107        assertEquals("4047000000000", a1.getUnit().toString());
108    }
109
110    @Test
111    public void testHecto() {
112        assertEquals("h", HECTO.getSymbol());
113        Quantity<Volume> v1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, HECTO(litre));
114        assertEquals("0.1", v1.getUnit().toString());
115    }
116
117    @Test
118    public void testKilo() {
119        final Quantity<Length> m1 = new DistanceQuantity(1, m);
120        final Unit<Length> km = KILO(m);
121        assertEquals("k", KILO.getSymbol());
122        assertEquals(1d, m1.getValue());
123        assertEquals("m * 1000.0", km.toString());
124        if (km instanceof TestUnit) {
125            @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
126            final TestUnit testKm = (TestUnit) km;
127            assertEquals(1000d, testKm.getMultFactor());
128        }
129    }
130
131    @Test
132    public void testMega() {
133        assertEquals("M", MEGA.getSymbol());
134        Quantity<Volume> v1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, MEGA(litre));
135        assertEquals("1000.0", v1.getUnit().toString());
136    }
137
138    @Test
139    public void testMilli() {
140        Quantity<Volume> m1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, MILLI(litre));
141        assertEquals(10d, m1.getValue());
142        assertEquals("0.0000010", m1.getUnit().toString());
143    }
144
145    @Test
146    public void testMicro() {
147        assertEquals("\\u00b5", toUnicode(MICRO.getSymbol().charAt(0)));
148        assertEquals("\u00b5", MICRO.getSymbol());
149        Quantity<Length> m1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, m);
150        assertEquals(1d, m1.getValue());
151        assertEquals("m", m1.getUnit().getSymbol());
152
153        Quantity<Length> m2 = m1.to(MICRO(m));
154        assertNull(m2); // TODO temporary workaround
155    }
156
157    @Test
158    public void testNano() {
159        Quantity<Length> m1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(1.0, m);
160        assertEquals(1d, m1.getValue());
161        assertEquals("m", m1.getUnit().getSymbol());
162
163        Quantity<Length> m2 = m1.to(NANO(m));
164        assertNull(m2); // TODO temporary workaround
165    }
166
167    @Test
168    public void testPeta() {
169        assertEquals("P", PETA.getSymbol());
170        Quantity<Speed> s1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, PETA(kmh));
171        assertEquals(10d, s1.getValue());
172        assertEquals("1000000000000000", s1.getUnit().toString());
173    }
174
175    @Test
176    public void testPico() {
177        assertEquals("p", PICO.getSymbol());
178        Quantity<Volume> v1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, PICO(litre));
179        assertEquals(10d, v1.getValue());
180        assertEquals("0.0000000000000010", v1.getUnit().toString());
181    }
182
183    @Test
184    public void testTera() {
185        assertEquals("T", TERA.getSymbol());
186        Quantity<Length> l1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, TERA(m));
187        assertEquals(10d, l1.getValue());
188        assertEquals("m * 1000000000000", l1.getUnit().toString());
189    }
190
191    @Test
192    public void testYocto() {
193        assertEquals("y", YOCTO.getSymbol());
194        Quantity<Volume> v1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, YOCTO(litre));
195        assertEquals(10d, v1.getValue());
196        assertEquals("0.000000000000000000000000001", v1.getUnit().toString());        
197    }
198
199    @Test
200    public void testYotta() {
201        assertEquals("Y", YOTTA.getSymbol());
202        Quantity<Area> a1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, YOTTA(sqmetre));
203        assertEquals(10d, a1.getValue());
204        assertEquals("1000000000000000000000000", a1.getUnit().toString());
205    }
206
207    @Test
208    public void testZepto() {
209        assertEquals("z", ZEPTO.getSymbol());
210        Quantity<Time> t1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, ZEPTO(s));
211        assertEquals(10d, t1.getValue());
212        assertEquals("s * 0.000000000000000000001", t1.getUnit().toString());
213    }
214
215    @Test
216    public void testZetta() {
217        assertEquals("Z", ZETTA.getSymbol());
218        Quantity<Length> l1 = TestQuantities.getQuantity(10, ZETTA(m));
219        assertEquals(10d, l1.getValue());
220        assertEquals("m * 1000000000000000000000", l1.getUnit().toString());
221    }
222
223    private static String toUnicode(char ch) {
224        return String.format("\\u%04x", (int) ch);
225    }
226}
